      • read_chunck

        public byte[] read_chunck(long start,
                          long offset,
                          int size_of_chunck,
                          int i_block,
                          boolean the_last)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a chunck of bytes (byte[])
        Parameters:
        start - Initial position
        offset - Length to read
        size_of_chunck - The chunck's size
        i_block - The block's index
        the_last - Whether the block is the last or not
        Returns:
        A chunck of "size_of_chunck" bytes (byte[])
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
